Key.Chinesesimp: 在游戏中修改视距设置

Key.English: View Settings module allows you to dynamically change the appropriate view and terrain grid distance in game. You can also force a fixed View Distance by setting max and min values the same!
Key.Chinesesimp: 视图设置模块允许您在游戏中动态更改适当的视图和地形网格距离。您还可以通过将最大值和最小值设置为相同来强制设置固定的“视距”！

Key.English: Maximum view distance allowed in Game
Key.Chinesesimp: 在游戏中允许的视距最大值

Key.English: Set you View distance in Game
Minimum view distance allowed in Game
Key.Chinesesimp: 在游戏中允许的视距最小值
在游戏中修改地形网格

Key.English: Maximum Terrain Grid allowed in Game 1 Low -> 5 High
Key.Chinesesimp: 游戏中允许的最大地形网格 1低 -> 5高

Key.English: Minimum Terrain Grid allowed in Game 1 Low -> 5 High
Key.Chinesesimp: 游戏中允许的最小地形网格 1低 -> 5高

Key.English: Only one View Distance module can be used
Key.Chinesesimp: 只能使用一个视距模块
